overview: If your dream of climbing Elbrus is just an emotion, you will not ascend. For the sake of a medal and a photo, you will not ascend. If Elbrus is a new frontier and a conscious choice - go for it! Rustam Nabiyev, who lost his legs as a result of the collapse of the barracks in 2015 in Omsk, made his ascent on his hands for the first time in the history of mountaineering.
title: 30 000 Whacks
